name: BurnOut (itch) (Senydesu, Thrudon)
description:
Hello everyone!

Here, you'll be able to play to our very first game.

It is called BurnOut, and the goal is to delete as many notifications that appear as you can, clicking on the X in the top left corner of the notification box, before your very own burn-out.

You'll have to delete as many as possible in 30 seconds. Don't worry, there will always be at least one on your screen, as notifications NEVER STOP APPEARING FROM NOWHERE!

Don't forget to share your score in the comments below! ^^

Sorry for the absence of sounds & music.

This game was done for the Trijam 89 in 2h and 56 minutes using Construct 2.

Made by Senydesu & Thrudon.
